affect.title: Affect
affect.description: Elements referring to internal states of teachers, students, managers, parents, and caregivers. For example: motivation, engagement, distress, and stress-related symptoms.

teachingPractice.title: Teaching practice
teachingPractice.description: Elements relating directly to the teaching process, e.g., online pedagogy and general or online teaching values. Note that assessment is considered together with achievement.

contextTeaching.title: Context of teaching
contextTeaching.description: Elements relating to the context within which the teaching is taking place, e.g., the universities, schools, or other organizational structures.

academicAchievementAssessment.title: Academic achievement and assessment
academicAchievementAssessment.description: Elements relating to the actual performance of students and the forms of assessment being used.

equity.title: Equity
equity.description: Elements relating to diversity and vulnerable student groups.
